features: 2 IN 1 SET FOR FEMININE WASH & CARE - Fivona's opulent fusion of nourishing Yoni Oil and Yoni Soap is thoughtfully crafted to elevate your feminine hygiene routine. Revel in gentle cleansing and hydration, maintain healthy skin and natural pH balance
PH BALANCED YONI OIL FOR DAILY CARE - Natural Oil Blend 30ml is perfect for a holistic daily hygiene routine that will rejuvenate and prevent dryness. Perfect for after wash and shave daily care

NATURAL FEMININE SOAP - Handmade Gentle Soap made with nourishing ingredients that have been carefully curated for gentle cleansing of delicate feminine areas. Soap helps to restore natural female balance, reduce itching, and eliminate bad odor

COMES WITH A MESH FOAMING NET - The set comes with a foaming net that works as an exfoliator, making it easier to soften the skin, and remove dull surfaces. It makes a rich lather from the soap that helps cleanse and moisturize the skin deeply

PERFECT GIFT FOR YOURSELF OR LOVED ONES - Gift yourself or a loved one the luxury of all-natural intimate care with 2 in 1 Fivona Purple Set. This kit will hydrate, cleanse and balance the pH of the delicate V area

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Luxurious Yoni Care Kit for Daily Feminine and Skincare Routine Take extra care of your intimate health with Fivona Yoni Care Combo. Cleansing with a herbal yoni soap bar and moisturizing with a yoni oil blend will surely leave you feeling fresh and rejuvenated all day! It is specially made for a gentle, effective, and all-natural feminine self-care routine.

Fivona All Natural pH Balanced Yoni Oil Fivona Yoni Oil Purple Secret is an organic herbal blend that can be used after yoni cleansing or any time of the day. A few drops can be placed on the skin, panty liner, or pad. It is gentle and easily absorbed by the skin for a long-lasting moisturizing effect and maintains a healthy yoni odor. Fivona Gentle Herbal Yoni Soap Bar Fivona Herbal Soap is ideal for daily body cleansing and gentle yoni washing. It comes with a foaming net that makes lather out of the soap and works as an exfoliator, making it easier to soften the skin, remove dull surfaces, and reveal a healthier complexion.

Made with Skin-Nourishing Organic Herbs and Natural Extracts Handmade and enriched with vitamins and antioxidants that your skin will surely love. Fivona Yoni Soap provides holistic benefits for common feminine and skin issues. It is free from harsh chemicals, ideal for gentle cleansing of the skin, especially in delicate feminine area.

Powerful Organic Ingredients Great for a Natural Yoni Detox Fivona Yoni Oil has a natural subtle scent that can help promote healthy v-odor. It can be used after a cleansing wash for a long-lasting moisturizing effect, helps to relieve irritation, reduce itching, and maintain female PH balance. Rich in antioxidants that boost healing and nourishing the skin.

Perfect Present for You or a Cherished One Treat yourself or a loved one to the all-natural intimate care with the 2 in 1 Fivona Purple Set. Kit is designed for essential hydration, thorough cleansing, and maintaining the delicate V area's optimal pH balance. It's the perfect choice for those who prioritize their feminine wellness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Soap smells so good and the lather is so rich and foamy. Will buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is very helpful for anyone who wants extra help down there-- or, for special occasions or whatnot.This is very easy to use, smells great, and helps balance everything. Very important.The box is discrete and everything is very nice. The instructions are helpful. Great gift (if you know the person isn't going to be insulted).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This a great set of feminine cleansers. They smell wonderful and work great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Move over Summers Eve lol. This is such an amazing feminine care set. The soft scent this product lets off is so nice. Soap lathers great and it leaves you feeling clean. The oil is also really good. This is definitely one of the best feminine care products I have used. This set comes packaged in such a pretty discrete box. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice self care kit. I like the subtle scent of both the soap and the oil and love the way the soap lathers and leaves me feeling fresh and clean. It also comes packaged really cute and would make a great gift for that reason. Would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wonderful wash kit for feminine needs, I love the scent and it doesn't irritate me, for reference I have been using this for the past several months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the Scent
reviews.reviewText: Really foams up when I'm taking a shower. And it leaves my skin feeling clean, not like there is something left behind.I've also used the oil and it sure has helped in the nether area.I really really love these. It is a light scent which I really enjoy.I am re-ordering these and am getting some for gifts. They are that effective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice kit for feminine care!
reviews.reviewText: Everything smells so good and is gentle and soft for my skin. You have to be VERY careful with products in your most delicate areas but these products are wonderful. The oil and soap are very cleansing and moisturizing with no issues.
